productname: Mumuksha Face Shield | Face Protector | Daily essential Multipurpose Face Cover | Compatible with face masks and glasses.
description:
Care Instructions: Washable
【Comfort and Design】Made of high quality ultra-clear and lightweight materials. The one-piece nose bridge design is comfortable to wear without discomfort, and the raised nose attachment allows enough distance between the nose and face to fit comfortably with or without glasses or sunglasses. These stylish goggle shields are perfect for men and women to wear for extended periods of time.
【Effective Safety Protection】The well-designed product outline can even be used as a bicycle windscreen, suitable for covering eyes, nose and mouth, it protects people both indoors and outdoors. Full protection for the face against droplets, saliva, splashes, oil and dust.
【Polycarbonate Lens】The face shield is made of environmentally friendly polycarbonate lenses which prevents chemicals, saliva, paint, etc. from splashing into the eyes. Longer life and tough enough to withstand pressure and drops, not easily deformed and torn.
【Reusable and Washable】The clear face shield can be disinfected at 120°. It can be washed with soap and water or wiped with disinfectant after each use.
【Wide Range of Use】Perfect for people working indoors or outdoors, visiting public places such as cafes and restaurants, beauty salons and barber stores, dental and medical offices, sports facilities, places of worship, educational facilities, schools, offices, public transportation. For teachers, receptionists, security and concierge staff, ride-sharing drivers, essential and non-essential staff, it is a must-have protection tool to reduce the risk of infection.

【Effective relief】Eggplant solid blackheads facial contains eggplant plant extracts, which can effectively relieve the growth of facial blackheads and reduce the formation of acne.Protein and vitamins can increase the skin's nutrients, making skin more delicate and smooth.

【Easy to Carry】The product adopts the design of rotating head, which is more convenient to use and not easy to dirty hands.The texture is fine and smooth, easy to spread and easy to apply.

productname: LADWA® 10 Pcs N95 Mask Washable, Unisex Face Mask with 5 Layers Filtration & Nose Clip (White, Pack of 10), Anti Pollution Mask With European Certification, Skin Friendly & Reusable Mask (10 Pieces)
